channel.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
channel.description:
In respons to the thread about the "Best Rare games and the best music in them", why shouldn't there be an thread about music in general?
So what videogame themes do you like? [COLOR='Red']I will now add Remixes to the list, gimme your best remixes! [COLOR='Red']RED = Songs of the week![/SIZE]
[COLOR='Red']Black Mesa Users Favorites[/SIZE] : [b]Super Mario Bros. Allstars - Main Theme[/b] [i]- Suggestion by mrfohlin -[/i] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zX9NC1iNbII&feature=related[/url] [b][Super Mario Galaxy - Gusty Garden Galaxy[/b] - [i] Suggestion by mrfohlin -[/i] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-z2kxFCQ_mQ[/url] [b]Secret of Mana - What the Forest taught me[/b] [i]- Suggestion by mrfohlin - [/i][url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sajoxHWcr-I[/url] [b][COLOR='Red']Duke Nukem 3D - Main Theme[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Xuri[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CezOHqlXAFY[/url] [b]Metroid Prime 3: Corruption - Mogenar Battle Theme [/b][i]- Suggestion by mrfohlin - [/i] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3TLQmFjufY[/url] [b]Doom 3 - Theme Song[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Ramirezoid and HWFG1[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ysDV9POBXE[/url] [b]Star Fox - Corneria[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Orpheon[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIP0TxIb8zg&feature=related[/url] [b]Myst - Myst Theme[/b] - [i]Suggestion by DinoTrasher[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VVdfgFr2-EU[/url] [b]TimeSplitters 2 - 1853 Wild West[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Zerego[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ftsP1KmzEjg[/url] [b]Dead Rising - Freelancer[/b] - [i]Suggestion by λdam[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ICzHVTb9qE[/url] [b]Halo 3 - One Final Effort[/b] -[i] Suggestion by Lolipopman[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fX63z4acmUo[/url] [b]Black Mesa - Black Mesa Theme[/b] - [i]Suggestion by DiePoente [/i]- [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FC6opHj83GU[/url] [b]Final Fantasy X - Seymour Battle Theme[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Daedalus[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dWE0nlhpdq8[/url] [b]Donkey Kong Country - Oil Drum Alley[/b] -[i] Suggestion by mrfohlin[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5YI6oxYQuPU[/url] [b]Braid - Downstream -[/b][i] Suggestion by Door[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tiWXrVXOMAU[/url] [b]Metroid Prime 2: Echoes - Main Theme - [/b][i] Suggestion by BaTz281[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oLOkc9MwFHs[/url] [b]Half-Life - Nuclear Mission Jam[/b] - [i]Suggestion by lambda[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MpNXztu9ndM[/url] [b]The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess - Hyrule Field(Orchestra)[/b] [i]- Suggestion by mrfohlin [/i]- [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ehs4DtEOZQM[/url] [b]F-Zero - Big Blue[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Elofs[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSb4XQwObIE[/url] [b]Quake 2 - Quad Machine[/b] - [i]Suggestion by Stuntz[/i] - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z6VpX-feA2M[/url] [b]Donkey Kong Country 2 - item.description:
I would like to say this one from Plants Vs. Zombies and this little bit from Civilazation 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Heaven’s Night - Konami Kukeiha Club- Silent Hill 2

Slaughter Club - Jesper Kyd - Hitman: Contracts

Young Men Dead - The Black Angels - Alan Wake

Triggernometry - Bill Elm & Woody Jackson - Red Dead Redemption

Boss Fight Music - Masanori Ohuchi, Aki Hata, Michiru Yamane, Masanori Adachi, Hiroshi Kobayashi - Rocket Knight Adventures

BB Corps - Harry Gregson Williams - Metal Gear Solid 4

El Cargo - Amon Tobin - Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell: Chaos Theory

Akuda House Propaganda - Christophe Heral - Beyond Good and Evil

Airlift_Deploy - Harry Gregson Williams - Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare

Escape the Dahaka - Stuart Chatwood - Prince of Persia: Warrior Within

First and Last - Michael McCann - Deus Ex: Human Revolution

I’ll Face Myself -Battle- Shoji Meguro - Shin Megami Tensei - Persona 4

Desmond Miles - Jesper Kyd - Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood

Twister - Takeharu Ishimoto - The World Ends With You

Dante’s Office 7 Hells Battle - Tetsuya Shibata - Devil May Cry 3: Dante’s Awakening

Scavenger - Bitstream Dream - Full Auto

CP Violation - Kelly Bailey - Half Life 2

Alden Strikes - Amon Tobin & Jim Dooley - inFamous

For The Motherland - Michael Giacchino - Mercenaries: Playground of Destruction

Caution: Plant Chapter - Norihiko Hibino - Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty

Escape from Frigate Orpheon - Kenji Yamamoto - Metroid Prime

Also: DOST THOU DESIRE THE POWER?!?

As insane as the above list is, I’ve played every single one of those games. I’m a bit of a game soundtrack junkie.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
danielsangeo:

Megaman 3 is better.

And with lyrics, it’s great, too.

EDIT: But if we’re going to the classics, then you can’t forget the Moon Theme from Ducktales.

I might blow your mind but there is an album of Megaman 2 rock covers with lyrics added https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vudQURQ7OFc

They are working on Megaman 3 right now

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: Briareos_H
item.description:
It is my opinion that the soundtrack of Portal 2 has been the best thing that could happen to both video game soundtracks and electronic music in years. People just don’t realise it yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
Medal of Honor Allied Assault (Main Theme): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ELFxB-tGhE

It could be just me though but I always have the feeling that at one point in the song it sounds like the Star Wars Theme will begin.

Damn, that Normandy beach landing chapter is still edged in my gaming memory. No Call Of Duty could surpass that afterwards.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
Nobody ever mentioned Operation Black Mesa’s soundtrack? It doesn’t fit that much with the game itself I think, but the music is the most beautiful I ever heard, especially this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W6xOkLpe-tc

Oslo By Night: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VpJu5SQDcHw
Hundred Miles: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Xsyn2AUBg4
Hospital: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5cRA0-miTi0

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
FluffyNinja:

Man, seems like there’s no love for the Call of Duty 1 OST. :X
Pegasus Bridge - Call of Duty
Red Square - Call of Duty

I love those tracks. CoD 1 had an amazing score. Gotta love Michael Giacchino.

As for some game OSTs I’ve been listening to lately:

Up, Up and Away - F-15 Strike Eagle II
Boss Fight - Rocket Knight Adventures
Restoration (Mota) - Phantasy Star II
Chemical Plant Zone - Sonic the Hedgehog 2

I’ve been on my Genesis a lot this week

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite Videogame music!
item.dc:creator: FluffyNinja
item.description:
Man, seems like there’s no love for the Call of Duty 1 OST. :X
Pegasus Bridge - Call of Duty
Red Square - Call of Duty

Here are some songs from Radiant Historia for the NDS: (<3 Yoko Shimomura)
Edge of Green - Yoko Shimomura
Red Locus - Yoko Shimomura
Where the Wind and Feathers Return - Yoko Shimomura

And some more random stuff.
Abandon All - Killing Floor
Dark Void Theme - Bear McCreary
Star Wars: Rogue Squadron Main Theme
Muscle Soul - Anders Lewen - BC2: Vietnam
Dearly Beloved - KH: Birth by Sleep

Damn, there are a lot more out there, but I’ll post these for now.

Read full topic
